name: Ironbark Treant

physical_description.appearance: An ancient treant whose bark has turned to living metal over millennia. Stands 30 feet tall with branches that gleam like polished steel, yet pulse with verdant life energy.
distinguishing_features: Metallic bark that rings like bells in wind
Golden sap that flows like liquid light
Voice that resonates through earth and stone

abilities.name: Metal Grove Summoning
abilities.description: Can cause metal trees to burst from the earth, creating instant fortifications

abilities.name: Earth Communion
abilities.description: Speaks with the collective memory of all forests, gaining ancient knowledge

abilities.name: Iron Bark Defense
abilities.description: Metallic bark provides incredible protection while maintaining living flexibility

habitat.territorial_behavior: Guardian of the entire Eternal Grove, protects all within its domain

lore_significance: Ironbark represents the pinnacle of what named monsters can achieve within their divine limitations. Despite possessing legendary power and ancient wisdom, he remains bound by the two-divine-influence barrier, demonstrating that even the mightiest monsters cannot transcend their fundamental nature to achieve humanoid-level mystical potential.
